War~?\""},{"lineNumber":105073,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうそう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, yes.\""},{"lineNumber":105074,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":105075,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たたかうの……嫌い〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I hate... fighting~...\""},{"lineNumber":105076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But...\""},{"lineNumber":105077,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アスカ、がんばると〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Asuka will do her best~."},{"lineNumber":105078,"originalJapaneseLine":"　じぃじ、よろこぶ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Grandpa will be happy...\""},{"lineNumber":105079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうすると……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And then...\""},{"lineNumber":105080,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アスカも嬉しい〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"Asuka will be happy too~\""},{"lineNumber":105081,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから〜、たたかうのきらい……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So~ I hate fighting...\""},{"lineNumber":105082,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でも好き〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"But I like it~\""},{"lineNumber":105083,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おお……アスカ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh... Asuka...\""},{"lineNumber":105084,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mm."},{"lineNumber":105085,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ありがと、修行に戻っていいわよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Thank you, you can go back to your training.\""},{"lineNumber":105086,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah~...\""},{"lineNumber":105087,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方の為なのは変わらないけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It hasn't changed that it's for you...\""},{"lineNumber":105088,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でも貴方を喜ばせたくてしているのよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"But I'm doing it because I want to make you happy.\""},{"lineNumber":105089,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方が言うから嫌々……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's not because I'm reluctantly doing it just because you say so...\""},{"lineNumber":105090,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんかじゃないわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's not like that.\""},{"lineNumber":105091,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アスカの為にも、それは分かってあげてよね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For Asuka's sake too, please understand that.\""},{"lineNumber":105092,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おうおう……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, oh...\""},{"lineNumber":105093,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ミル殿……感謝ですぞ……感謝です……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Mil-dono... I am grateful... truly grateful...\""},{"lineNumber":105094,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふ〜ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":105095,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、なに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm, what?\""},{"lineNumber":105096,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、ミルったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, Mil really is...\""},{"lineNumber":105097,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょっとミリに似てきたんじゃない？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Starting to look a bit like Miri, don't you think?\""},{"lineNumber":105098,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー？　まだおっぱい小さいよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? Your boobs are still small though?\""},{"lineNumber":105099,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そういう意味じゃなくて……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not that meaning...\""},{"lineNumber":105100,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふふ、まあいいわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe, well, whatever.\""},{"lineNumber":105101,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？？？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"???\""},{"lineNumber":105102,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わっ、でた〜！　でた〜！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah, it appeared~! It appeared~!\""},{"lineNumber":105103,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":105104,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、わ、ここはどこ？　私は誰ー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-where is this? Who am I?\""},{"lineNumber":105105,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":105106,"originalJapaneseLine":"「失敗ね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Failure.\""},{"lineNumber":105107,"originalJapaneseLine":"「かえって、かえって。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Go back, go back."},{"lineNumber":105108,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぽかぽか、ぽかぽか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Warm, warm.\""},{"lineNumber":105109,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわーん、よく分からないけど、ひどいよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaah, I don't really understand, but this is awful!\""},{"lineNumber":105110,"originalJapaneseLine":"「せ、精一杯……戦わせて頂きますわ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I will do my best... to fight...\""},{"lineNumber":105111,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ、はあ……はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huff, haah... haah...\""},{"lineNumber":105112,"originalJapaneseLine":"メルフェイスが息を荒くしながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Mel Face was breathing heavily,"},{"lineNumber":105113,"originalJapaneseLine":"よたよたとランス城の廊下を歩いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"staggering as she walked down the hallway of Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":105114,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　どうした、メルフェイスちゃん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm? What's wrong, Mel Face-chan?\""},{"lineNumber":105115,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……総統……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... Supreme Commander...\""},{"lineNumber":105116,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、いえ、これはなんでも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no, it's nothing...\""},{"lineNumber":105117,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんでもない、って感じには見えんぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It doesn't look like nothing.\""},{"lineNumber":105118,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":105119,"originalJapaneseLine":"「呪いは二ヶ月に一回だったろう？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The curse happens once every two months, right?\""},{"lineNumber":105120,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう辛いのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you already in pain?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ありがと、修行に戻っていいわよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thank you, you can go back to your training."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方の為なのは変わらないけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It hasn't changed that it's for you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも貴方を喜ばせたくてしているのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I'm doing it because I want to make you happy."
"It's not because I'm reluctantly doing it just because you say so..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アスカの為にも、それは分かってあげてよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For Asuka's sake too, please understand that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミル殿……感謝ですぞ……感謝です……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mil-dono... I am grateful... truly grateful..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとミリに似てきたんじゃない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Starting to look a bit like Miri, don't you think?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んー？　まだおっぱい小さいよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? Your boobs are still small though?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、わ、ここはどこ？　私は誰ー？」
「うわーん、よく分からないけど、ひどいよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Waaah, I don't really understand, but this is awful!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せ、精一杯……戦わせて頂きますわ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I will do my best... to fight..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスが息を荒くしながら、
よたよたとランス城の廊下を歩いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: staggering as she walked down the hallway of Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　どうした、メルフェイスちゃん」
「なんでもない、って感じには見えんぞ」
「呪いは二ヶ月に一回だったろう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The curse happens once every two months, right?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
